content.html: Y’all know the majority of gender affirming surgery is done on Cisgender bodies right? Breast augmentation, genioplasty, gynecomastia, rhinoplasty, HRT for menopause, Testosterone shots for sperm production - leave trans kids alone. #ProtectTransKids
